resources.string: It looks like you\'re trying to awaken from cryosleep. Would you like my help?
Excellent! It says here your name is
Program received signal SIGSEGV: Segmentation Fault
Ah, I seem to have forgotten it. Remind me\?
Clippy: I pronounce that right? Anyways, our
Active Starship Administratorâ„¢ set a policy requiring all users to have a password. That said, they didn\'t set a minimum length, so you can make like Stallman and set it to newline (i.e. nothing)
Cool password! So, tell me when you\'re ready, and I\'ll go ahead and register you. Then I can give you a brief introduction, if you\'d like.
